translation.ko: 신문에서 갑자기 흥미를 잃고 보도 안 하잖니

translation.en: We had an opportunity on the eve of a national strike,
to show the people what their healthcare system can do for them.
translation.ko: 훌륭한 보건 시스템을 보여 줄 기회였는데

translation.en: Instead, all they know is that you are nice to children.
I'm sorry. I... I'm trying.
It's gonna take me a while to get the hang of things.
Being royal is not like being famous or being rich.
translation.ko: 왕족에겐 유명하거나 부유한 면만 있는 게 아냐

translation.en: It is something much, much more.
It is a way of being that can only be learned from birth.
It is an embodiment
translation.ko: 자신이 누구고 어떤 사람이 돼야 하는지

translation.en: which requires you to sacrifice who you are for who you must be.
translation.ko: 자신이 누구고 어떤 사람이 돼야 하는지 깨닫고 희생할 줄 알아야 해

translation.en: Well, I'm Paige Morgan from Manitowoc, Wisconsin.
translation.ko: 전 위스콘신 매니토웍 출신의 페이지 모건이에요

translation.en: Paige Morgan can no longer exist.
She is gone.
You are now the future queen of Denmark...
translation.ko: 넌 미래의 덴마크 왕비가 될 사람이야

translation.en: Plain and simple.
Excuse me, Your Majesty.
Your Royal Highness, it's time to leave.
[Eddie] All right. Thank you, Soren.
His Royal Highness, the Crown Prince.
-Royal Highness. -Prime Minister.
Good morning, ladies and gentlemen.
In the interest of expedience, I've asked the lead negotiator for the national unions...
-Good morning. -...and the lead negotiator for our nation's corporate interests to join us.
Good morning.
[man 1] I'm very pleased to meet you. [man 2] Nice to meet you again.
[Anderson] Your Royal Highness.
I know your exposure to these proceedings has been rather limited...
Mr. Anderson, I'm well aware of the traditions and the protocols of this chamber, and while I respect them,
translation.ko: 앤더슨 씨, 이곳의 전통과 의전을 잘 알고 존중하지만

translation.en: we only have six hours before all hell breaks loose.
So don't you think the time for gamesmanship has passed?
translation.ko: 수 싸움할 시간은 아끼는 게 좋겠죠?

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Then we are in agreement.
Please be seated.
And get comfortable... Because we're not leaving here until this is solved.
translation.ko: 이 일을 해결하기 전까지 못 나가니 편하게 하죠

translation.en: -[man 1] And where will this additional money come from? -[man 2] No, no, no!
translation.ko: - 또 돈이 어디서 나와요? - 아뇨, 아니죠

translation.en: [man 3] Well, perhaps management will tighten their belts.
-[man 1] Our belts? -[man 3] Yes! It might do you some good
-to go without. -[man 1] These are businesses, not charities.
[Prime Minister] If we can't come to a resolution about wages, perhaps we can discuss concessions on benefits.
translation.ko: 임금에 합의 못 하면 서로 수당이라도 양보하죠

translation.en: -No concessions! -You take and take
translation.ko: - 양보 못 해요 - 아무런 보상도 없이

translation.en: -and will give nothing in return! -You are impossible!
Gentlemen, please. Let's remember this is not about us.
You know, when I was in America,
I, um... I spent some time with Paige's family on her farm.
[Eddie] And they explained something to me.
That we are all interdependent.
So we had better start caring for our opposition as much as we do for ourselves.
translation.ko: 그러니 우리 편만큼 상대편도 위하는 태도가 필요해요

translation.en: I wonder if anyone on this table knows what it's like to work for a tiny wage.
translation.ko: 저임금 노동자의 실상을 아시는 분 있나요?

translation.en: And then to see that wage get sliced up even further by taxes.
translation.ko: 그 적은 임금마저 세금 때문에 줄어들죠

translation.en: Now, I can tell you from experience, it can be a mighty struggle.
But then I suspect it would be substantially more difficult to see your job
translation.ko: 노조 입장에선 일자리뿐 아니라 수당까지 함께 잃어버리면

translation.en: and your benefits disappear altogether.
translation.ko: 노조 입장에선 일자리뿐 아니라 수당까지 함께 잃어버리면 더욱더 힘겨울 겁니다

translation.en: Now, at the moment, we are six percent apart. Correct?
translation.ko: 서로 요구하는 게 6% 차이가 나는 거 맞죠?

translation.en: Now, if the goal is to let the workers keep more without damaging the corporation,
translation.ko: 회사에 손해 끼치지 않고 노동자의 혜택을 늘이기 위해

translation.en: then perhaps there's a third path to consider.
translation.ko: 제3의 방안을 고려해 볼 수도 있어요

translation.en: He was brilliant.
He got the unions to lower their demands,
translation.ko: 노조의 요구액을 낮추고 기업 제안액을 높이며

translation.en: and the corporations to raise their offer,
translation.ko: 노조의 요구액을 낮추고 기업 제안액을 높이며 국회가 소득세를 줄이게 해 그 차이를 메웠죠

translation.en: and then he got Parliament to cut the workers' wage tax to make up the difference.
translation.ko: 국회가 소득세를 줄이게 해 그 차이를 메웠죠

translation.en: Now, that's impressive.
Okay, about the dress. Am I supposed to be able to breathe?
translation.ko: - 이 드레스는… - 숨은 쉴 수 있는 거죠?

translation.en: -No. -Oh, well, then it's perfect.
Miss Paige, the Queen would like to see you immediately.
Don't worry. I'll be by your side the entire time.
translation.ko: 걱정 마세요 제가 계속 곁에 있을게요

translation.en: -Soren, get out. -Yes, Your Majesty.
[Paige] Thanks.
[Queen Rosalind] These are my new babies.
My new hopefuls.
I know you think I don't like you.
[Queen Rosalind] I like traditions.
I like traditions, and I like consistency and continuity,
and I don't like change.
But...
When that change is for the better...
When it helps turn a boy into a man,
then I have to reconsider.
Two weeks ago, I thought you were the end of the monarchy.
translation.ko: 2주 전엔 너 때문에 이 왕실이 끝날 줄 알았다

translation.en: Now I see you may be the best thing that ever happened to us.
translation.ko: 하지만 이제 보니 최고의 보배 같구나

translation.en: Thank you.
And now we have that settled...
We have to make you into the best queen that Denmark has ever had.
translation.ko: 널 역대 최고의 덴마크 왕비로 만드는 일만 남았지

translation.en: Come with me.
Between you and me, Paige,
being queen is not without its charms.
So, my dear,
what would you like to wear to the coronation ball?
translation.ko: 대관식 때 어떤 보석으로 치장하고 싶니?

translation.en: Oh. Very beautiful.
Your ears will be killing you by the end of the evening, though. Trust me.
translation.ko: 하지만 귀가 아파서 견디기 힘들 거야

translation.en: Harry Winston.
It's very appropriate.
-Sorry. Would you excuse me? -[man 1] Certainly, sir. [man 2] Yes, Your Highness.
Sorry. Pardon me.
Paige, may I have this dance?
[Paige] Of course.
I hope you don't mind, but I've requested our song.
translation.ko: 마음에 들지 몰라도 우리 주제곡을 신청했어

translation.en: We have a song?
We have a song!
Let's go somewhere.
It kind of bothers me.
Oh, right. Come with me.
[Soren] Excuse me, sir.
I know that you and your father wanted to speak privately with the King of Norway before he left.
translation.ko: 노르웨이 국왕이 떠나기 전에 아버님과 함께 만나셔야죠

translation.en: Right, of course. Thank you, Soren.
Listen, when I get back, I've got a special treat for you.
translation.ko: 있잖아, 내가 돌아오면 특별한 선물을 보여 줄게

translation.en: Oh, good. I was wondering when I was going to start being treated well.
translation.ko: 좋아, 언제 특별한 대우를 해 주나 기다렸지

translation.en: [King Haraald] Edvard.
-You remember my son, Edvard? -[Eddie] Very nice to meet you.
translation.ko: 내 아들 녀석 기억하지? 다시 뵙게 돼서 반갑습니다

translation.en: -Nice to see you again. -[man] You, too.
Father, I really think you should be sitting down.
[man] Did those Egyptian photographers make you pose for all those photos riding on camels?
translation.ko: 이집트 사진작가가 낙타에 탄 포즈까지 취해 달라고 하던가?

translation.en: -[King Haraald laughing] Yeah. -[man] Interesting creatures.
They store all that water, but they never seem to bathe in it.
translation.ko: 물을 잔뜩 저장하면서 씻지는 않는 것 같거든

translation.en: [King Haraald] Oh, yeah.
[Eddie] So down to business.
We have to talk about fishing rights.
We've both signed a treaty.
The main thing is to maintain stock and to respect...
Right, I've got something to show you.
translation.ko: 자, 너한테 보여 줄 게 있어

translation.en: Stay there.
-Ta-da. -[laughs]
Now...
Relax, my dear, as I make you
translation.ko: 좋아, 편하게 기다려 내가 지금부터 완벽한… 샌드위치를 만들어 줄게

translation.en: the perfect sandwich.
translation.ko: 내가 지금부터 완벽한… 샌드위치를 만들어 줄게

translation.en: I think you'll find
that the student has now become the teacher.
translation.ko: 이젠 내가 한 수 가르쳐 주겠어

translation.en: I can see how proud your father is of you.
[Eddie] Yes.
Eddie, this has all been extraordinary.
translation.ko: 에디, 이 일은 정말 꿈만 같았어

translation.en: A real-life fairy tale.
But I can't do it anymore.
What?
What are you saying?
I'm saying I can't stay.
Well, what's the matter?
When I first met you,
I was so focused because I was scared.
And you got me out of that, which is the greatest thing anyone's ever done for me.
translation.ko: 네 덕분에 거기서 벗어났으니 그 무엇보다 기뻤지

translation.en: But I'm still me, and all the things that I want to do are still a part of me...
translation.ko: 하지만 내 본모습은 그대로고 하고 싶은 일도 있어

translation.en: And I thought I could make myself forget about that,
translation.ko: 그걸 잊고 살 수 있을 줄 알았는데

translation.en: but I can't.
What about us?
You belong here, not me.
translation.ko: 난 너랑 달리 여기 안 어울려

translation.en: And your father needs you to be there
translation.ko: 아버님도 네가 곁에 있어 주길 원하시잖아

translation.en: for your mother and Arabella.
I mean, is... Is that it? We never see each other again?
translation.ko: 이렇게 끝내자고? 다신 못 만나는 거야?

translation.en: I don't know.
I don't know.
I can't make you stay, can I?
[softly] I can't make you stay.
Long live His Majesty, King Edvard III.
Today marks a profound, though bittersweet, milestone for all of us
translation.ko: 오늘은 모두에게 기쁨과 슬픔이 교차하는 중요한 날입니다

translation.en: as we bear witness to both an end and a beginning.
translation.ko: 끝과 시작을 함께 지켜보게 되기 때문이죠

translation.en: And while we must continue on,
we must also be grateful
to have been blessed with someone who has so ably guided us to where we are today.
translation.ko: 훌륭하게 이끌어 주신 분께 경의를 표해야 할 것입니다

translation.en: When there has been so much love
and happiness for someone,
it is natural to be reluctant
to close such a wonderful chapter in our lives.
-Excuse me. -For moving forward
is rarely accomplished without considerable grief and sadness.
translation.ko: 커다란 슬픔과 괴로움도 견뎌야 하는 법입니다

translation.en: And while our sorrow may be profound,
the clouds will clear
and the sun will shine on us again.
And in that warm, bright light,
translation.ko: 그리고 그 따듯하고 밝은 빛 속에서

translation.en: we will find ourselves facing a glorious future.
A future of exciting challenges and infinite possibility,
translation.ko: 그 미래엔 흥미로운 모험과 무한한 가능성이 펼쳐질 겁니다

translation.en: in which the horizon will stretch out before us,
rimmed in the heavenly glow of the sunrise of our tomorrow.
translation.ko: 천상의 빛처럼 태양이 떠오르며 우리 미래를 비출 것입니다

translation.en: Coming! I'm coming! Here we are!
-[Ben] Can everybody... -[girls chattering]
translation.ko: 자, 모두 모여 봐 너희끼리 단체 사진 찍어

translation.en: [Ben] Can we get the girls together for a group shot?
Just a quick one. Okay? Great. All right.
translation.ko: 얼른 찍어 보자 그래, 좋아 됐어

translation.en: Okay. Amy, sweetheart.
All right, Amy. Amy, here. All right, girls? Girls?
translation.ko: - 여보, 이리 와 - 미안해 - 자, 아가씨들! - 감사해요

translation.en: -Say, "Cheese curds." -Cheese curds!
-[camera shutter clicks] -Excellent.
Beautiful, girls.
I'm so proud of you.
Let me see.
Oh, sweetheart... [Eddie] Thou art as wise as thou art beautiful.
I want you in my life, Paige.
I want to marry you.
translation.ko: 너랑 결혼하고 싶어 의대를 졸업하고 박사님이 돼서

translation.en: If that means I have to wait until you finish medical school,
become a doctor and anything else you want to do, then I'll do it.
translation.ko: 네가 하고 싶은 일을 할 때까지 기다려 줄게

translation.en: I'll wait.
Denmark isn't ready for a queen like me.
translation.ko: 덴마크는 나 같은 왕비를 못 받아들여

translation.en: Well, then they'll have to be.
Because I am.
